//Non-Animated:
//  GrhIndex = Frames - FileNumber - X - Y - Width - Height
//Animated:
//  GrhIndex = Frames - GrhIndex - For - Each - Frame... - Speed
//Speed is 10/x seconds, so 1 = 10 sec, 10 = 1 sec, 100 = 1/10th of a sec, etc

{ System
//Grid
1=1-1-0-0-32-32

//Tile attribute dot
2=1-1-33-0-5-5
}
